resources.string: Overlay permission is needed. Please grant it to use the ruler.
7 colorful ruler lines are visible in both orientations. Drag the numbered handles in landscape mode to adjust positions. Use \'Close\' in overlay or \'Stop Ruler\' here.
This app needs permission to display ruler lines over other apps. Without this permission, the ruler cannot work.

This app displays 7 horizontal ruler lines over other apps in all orientations.

1. Tap 'Start Ruler' (or 'Grant Permission' if needed).
2. The lines are always visible and stay in the same positions when rotating.
3. In landscape mode: Drag the numbered colored handles to move each line.
4. In portrait mode: Lines are visible but not adjustable.
5. The lines stay visible when you switch to other apps.
6. Tap the 'Ã—' button in the overlay (bottom-right) to hide the lines.
The ruler cannot function without the overlay permission. Please grant the permission if you wish to use the ruler.
